means: 错误地判断，冤枉( misjudge的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She now realizes that she misjudged him.
sentence.Network_cn: 她现在意识到她错看了他。

sentence.Network_en: I felt small when I learned how badly I had misjudged him.
sentence.Network_cn: 知道错怪了他时,我感到很惭愧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: rating agencies badly misjudged default rates in subprime mortgages and are now having to downgrade reams of securities linked to them .那些评估公司很错误的估计了次级房贷的破产率，目前必须将一系列的与这房贷有关的债券进行降级。
some observers wonder whether TfL has fundamentally misjudged the nature of bike demand .一些观察家质疑，伦敦交通局是否从根本上错误估计了自行车需求的本质。
The president had misjudged the mood of the people on this issue ., 总统在这个问题上错误地判断了公众的心态.
The United States misjudged the situation ., 这次美国又错误地判断了形势.

list.abs: I'm sorry I misjudged you / your motives .对不起，我误会你[你的动机]了。
system of revestigating into misjudged cases ., 错案追究制度.
警务英语简明教程 Unit1-5 ... run the red light 闯红灯 misjudged case n 冤案 Chinese Criminal Code 中国刑法.
I'm sorry I misjudged you / your motives .对不起，我误会你[你的动机]了。

entry.tran: 错看;对…判断错误；对…有错误认识
entry.def: If you say that someone has misjudged a person or situation, you mean that they have formed an incorrect idea or opinion about them, and often that they have made a wrong decision as a result of this.

example.ex: Perhaps I had misjudged him, and he was not so predictable after all...
example.tran: 也许我看错了他，毕竟他不是可以让人一眼看透的人。

example.ex: As I swung down from out of my bunk, I got dizzy and misjudged the distance.
example.tran: 从铺位一跃而下的时候，我感到一阵眩晕，没掌握好高度。

auth_sentence.content: My every action is misjudged and every word distorted.
auth_sentence.res_content: My every action is misjudged and every word distorted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My every action is misjudged and every word distorted.

auth_sentence.content: He had misjudged her attitude, misconstrued her motives.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had misjudged her attitude, misconstrued her motives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had misjudged her attitude, misconstrued her motives.

auth_sentence.content: Never a dull moment or a misjudged move.
auth_sentence.res_content: Never a dull moment or a misjudged move.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Never a dull moment or a misjudged move.
